SunEditor Demo

SunEditor is a pure JavaScript based WYSIWYG web editor, with no dependencies.

Formatting Options

SunEditor provides comprehensive text formatting options:

  • Bold for emphasis
  • Italics for titles and foreign words
  • Underline for important text
  • Strikethrough for deleted content
  • Highlighted text for attention

Mathematical Content

The editor handles superscripts and subscripts well:

  • Einstein's famous equation: E = mc2
  • Water molecule: H2O
  • Quadratic formula uses x2

Block Elements

"The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now."

Code Blocks

function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}
